name: "Roll" - Minijam#83
description:
*** Recommended to play full screen. Some levels may not function as intended otherwise Mouse and keyboard required ***

This is my submission for the Minijam #83. I decided to ditch the theme of "dread" as I really didnt have tons of time to work on this one.  With more time, I would have certainly built more levels, but I hope its enough for a bit of feedback at least. 

cheers
